title: summoner icons
body: is there a way to add a summoner icon  i.e.    photo of my bike instead of the list provided;  upload a pic.

replies.body: There aren't custom summon icons, but I think it's a neat idea!  I recommend suggesting it to our client team over at the[ client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Good luck!
